qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Clarksville General Hospital and Bayside General Hospital, what are the ages of patients O. Myers and H. Nelson?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Clarksville General Hospital, patient O. Myers is 13 years old; according to the hospitalization records of Bayside General Hospital, patient H. Nelson is 47 years old.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Clarksville General Hospital and Bayside General Hospital, what are the diagnosis results of O. Myers and H. Nelson?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Clarksville General Hospital, O. Myers was diagnosed with Pregnancy complicated by hyperthyroidism; according to the hospitalization records of Bayside General Hospital, H. Nelson was diagnosed with Thalassemia.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records, which hospitals were O. Myers and H. Nelson admitted to?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records, O. Myers was admitted to Clarksville General Hospital and H. Nelson was admitted to Bayside General Hospital.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Clarksville General Hospital and Bayside General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, O. Myers or H. Nelson?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: O. Myers was admitted on April 20th, and H. Nelson was admitted on October 6th. O. Myers was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.answer: O. Myers is 13 years old, and H. Nelson is 47 years old. O. Myers is younger.

qa_multi_document_compare.answer: O. Myers' pulse rate is 110 bpm, and H. Nelson's pulse rate is 88 bpm. O. Myers' pulse rate is higher.
